channel.title: Help my bro cant connect to my server?
channel.description:
Was just wondering I'm using a PI client i have 2 worlds one for myself to login which is 127.0.0.1 and the other world is my no-ip address but my brother cant connect to neither of these ip's other people can connect to my no-ip so it shows the server is online and correctly port forwarded just need help so my bro can come on to the server.
Thank you.

item.title: Help my bro cant connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @GraniteStorm GraniteStorm
item.description:
@GraniteStorm wrote:

Fixed thanks for the help.

Read full topic

GraniteStorm:

is that the one thats starts with 192 ?

Correct.

item.title: Help my bro cant connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

Obviously your brother can’t connect to 127.0.0.1 - that’s your loopback address. If your brother is in the same household as you, tell him to connect to your local IP, the one given to you from ipconfig or ifconfig if you’re on Linux.

Read full topic
item.source: Help my bro cant connect to my server?
